title: Bitcoin ETF apathy is pressuring a key Bitcoin support level
contentSnippet: Without Bitcoin ETF holding sustained inflows, Bitcoin could succumb to “demand side fragility,” warns analysts from Bitfinex.

title: アーサーヘイズのビットコイン100万ドル予想、高市政権の積極財政は市場の起爆剤になり得るか？
contentSnippet: BitMEX創業者アーサー・ヘイズ氏が、高市新政権の物価高対策によりビットコイン価格が100万ドル(約1.5億円)に達すると予測した。同氏は景気刺激策の推進が、日銀の量的緩和（QE）への転換につながると見ている。

title: ルミス米上院議員、仮想通貨アプリを後押しするオープンバンキング規則設立求める
contentSnippet: 米ルミス上院議員がCFPBにオープンバンキング規則の策定を要請した。銀行口座と仮想通貨取引所を接続するAPI活用で迅速な送金を目指す。大手銀行の反対姿勢も指摘した。

title: WazirX to Restart Trading on Friday After $230M Hack Caused Year-Long Shutdown
contentSnippet: That was the final step in a process that began after a massive security breach last year froze assets, shuttered withdrawals, and effectively took India’s oldest crypto platform offline.

title: Bitcoin miner debt surges 500% as miners beef up for the hashrate fight
contentSnippet: VanEck’s Nathan Frankovitz and Matthew Sigel said if miners don’t keep investing in the latest machines, the share of the global hashrate deteriorates, resulting in reduced Bitcoin rewards.

title: Is Bitcoin Headed for a Crash Below $100K? ‘Grand Daddy’ Volume Indicator Hits Lowest Since April
contentSnippet: A key volume indicator points to underlying market weakness, signaling a potential bitcoin sell-off below $100,000

title: ARK Invest-backed firm becomes largest ETH hoarder outside the US
contentSnippet: ARK Invest-backed Quantum Solutions is now the largest Ether treasury outside of the US and has a 100,000 ETH treasury target.

title: リミックスポイント、株式希薄化を伴わない仮想通貨購入方針を決議
contentSnippet: 株式会社リミックスポイントは10月23日、2026年6月まで株式発行による暗号資産購入を行わない方針を決議。今後は手元資金等を活用し、既存株主への希薄化を回避する。

title: Paxos Co-Founder Calls 'Transparency' a Silver Lining Following $300T Stablecoin Snafu
contentSnippet: The Paxos CEO attempted to reframe the minting incident as validation of blockchain technology's transparency benefits.

title: XRP Price Structure Tightens Between $2.33 and $2.44 Ahead of Volatility Break
contentSnippet: Traders are watching for a breakout above $2.41 or a decline below $2.33 to signal the next directional move.

title: Dogecoin Tests $0.19 Support as Tight Range Signals Breakout Potential
contentSnippet: Traders identify continued divergence between rising volume and flat price as a key accumulation signal — often a precursor to volatility expansion within 24–48 hours.

title: Hyperliquid Strategies wants $1B to buy further into the HYPE
contentSnippet: Hyperliquid Strategies is looking to raise up to $1 billion by raising shares of common stock to fund additional HYPE purchases.

title: Hyperliquid Strategies Looks to Raise to $1B to Fund HYPE Treasury Purchases
contentSnippet: The company plans to issue up to 160 million shares, with Chardan Capital Markets as the financial advisor.

title: Jupiter eyes full launch of its new predictions market before 2026
contentSnippet: The prediction market is expected to be fully launched sometime in the fourth quarter of the calendar year.

title: Hyperliquid Token Defies Bitcoin Slump as Wall Street Fund Moves In
contentSnippet: HYPE climbed after a Nasdaq biotech firm struck an $888 million deal to create a new company set to hold and buy more of the token.

title: Bitcoin may 'final flush' to $104K before the bull market returns
contentSnippet: Crypto analysts predicted Bitcoin could fall to its 50-week moving average before reversing, citing leverage concerns and historical support patterns.

title: Another ‘legacy’ asset manager enters the crypto ETF ‘land rush’
contentSnippet: T. Rowe Price, a $1.8 trillion asset manager, has made its first crypto play, filing to list a US-listed Active Crypto ETF in a twist that surprised some analysts.

title: ビットコインは弱含みで推移、米コインベースとロビンフッドにBNB上場へ
contentSnippet: ビットコインは10万8000ドル台で弱含みの推移。米大手取引所CoinbaseとRobinhoodが相次いでBNB上場を発表し、規制環境の変化を示す歴史的な動きとして注目を集めている。一方、トランプ関税ショックで巨額利益を上げた大口投資家が再び大規模なショートポジションを構築しており、市場は警戒感を強めている。

title: ‘Crazy stuff’ needed for Bitcoin to reach $250K this year: Novogratz
contentSnippet: Several prominent Bitcoiners remain confident that Bitcoin will hit $250,000 by year-end, but Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz isn't so sure.

title: 米民主党議員ら、トランプ政権中東特使に仮想通貨開示要求　利益相反を指摘
contentSnippet: 米民主党議員らがウィトコフ中東特使に保有する仮想通貨などについて情報提供を求めた。トランプ一族のWLFI関連で利益相反の可能性を指摘している。

title: Asia Morning Briefing:  BTC, ETH Markets Steady as Traders Await CPI and China-U.S. De-Escalation Signs
contentSnippet: Investors are in wait-and-see mode as the U.S. shutdown stalls data releases and China signals restraint on export controls, keeping markets range-bound ahead of Friday’s CPI report.

title: ハイパーリキッド・ストラテジーズ、最大約1500億円調達をSECに提出　HYPEトークン購入含む
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のハイパーリキッド・ストラテジーズが最大10億ドル（約1,500億円）の資金調達を目指すS-1をSECに提出した。HYPEトークン購入を含む。7月設立後、早くも大規模増資計画。

title: Coinbase Links AI to Crypto Payments With New Protocol for Autonomous Transactions
contentSnippet: The exchange’s new tool connects large language models to crypto wallets, marking another step toward machine-to-machine commerce.

title: 計2600億円相当のビットコイン、ハッキングされたLuBian関連のウォレットから移動
contentSnippet: 計2600億円超相当の仮想通貨ビットコインが、マイニングプールLuBianに関連するウォレットから移動。トランザクションは4つに分けられて別々のアドレスに送金されている。

title: Young Australians’ biggest financial regret: Ignoring Bitcoin at $400
contentSnippet: Young Australians feel they could have made a bigger dent in their property goals if they had invested in cryptocurrency 10 years ago, and now they’re locked out.

title: 「ビットコインにとって2025年のゴールド高騰は好材料」Bitwiseが市況分析
contentSnippet: Bitwiseは、ゴールドの価格上昇は仮想通貨ビットコインにとって好材料であるとの見方を示した。ゴールドの価格上昇の要因や市況を分析した上で、ビットコインにも同様のことが起きうると予測している。

title: Crypto Adoption in Australia Stalls as Trust Drops Despite Labor’s Push for Regulation
contentSnippet: Despite a year of sweeping reforms, Australia’s crypto market remains frozen as investors wait for new digital asset laws to take effect.

title: Stanford’s Light-Powered Eye Chip Brings Sight Back to the Blind
contentSnippet: In a medical first, Stanford scientists have restored functional vision to patients with advanced macular degeneration using a wireless implant that turns light into sight—allowing the blind to read,

title: DraftKings taps Polymarket to clear trades in prediction markets play
contentSnippet: Polymarket will act as a clearinghouse for DraftKings’ upcoming prediction market platform, following its acquisition of Railbird earlier this week.

title: Melania Trump, Javier Milei Used as 'Props' for Meme Coin Fraud, Lawsuit Alleges
contentSnippet: A legal filing in a class action crypto fraud suit points the finger not at Melania Trump or Javier Milei, but instead at a startup founder.

title: Ex-Crypto Exec Claims DeFi Company Cut Him Out of Lucrative Stablecoin Biz M^0
contentSnippet: Former RWA Company exec Max Glass alleges in a lawsuit that he was wrongfully excluded from a stablecoin venture that turned into M^0, the infra provider behind MetaMask's mUSD.

title: T. Rowe Price Files for Mixed Crypto ETF With Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana Exposure
contentSnippet: The asset manager joins a growing list of traditional finance firms that have proposed digital asset-focused funds.

title: Big Gaps Remain After Crypto Execs Meet With Senators on Market Structure Bill
contentSnippet: Senate Democrats and Republicans remain far apart on timeline and other key issues after flashy meetings with crypto leaders on Wednesday.

title: Crypto Is Finally Growing Up, Says VC Giant Andreessen Horowitz
contentSnippet: Andreessen Horowiz's State of Crypto 2025 crypto report highlights Bitcoin dominance, stablecoin demand, institutional adoption, and more.

title: Tesla Booked $80M Profit on Bitcoin Holdings in Q3
contentSnippet: The company's digital asset holdings were valued at $1.315 billion as of Sept. 30 versus $1.235 billion three months earlier.

title: Crypto Exchange Kraken Is Taking Staff on Caribbean Island Retreat in January: Sources
contentSnippet: Kraken has also handed all its employees a special one-off bonus, according to the sources.

title: A ‘Skinny’ Fed Master Account Could Bring Back Narrow Banking
contentSnippet: Fed Governor Chris Waller’s payments account proposal would let the private sector innovate at the front end and keep the Fed as the trusted settlement layer behind it, argues Digital Self Labs’ Linda

title: U.S. Senate Democrats Assure Crypto CEOs They're Still Willing to Move Legislation
contentSnippet: Several top crypto executives met with senators to hash out next steps on moving forward with the bill that would regulate U.S. crypto markets.

title: ソラナ（SOL）現物ETF、香港で初承認　10月27日取引開始
contentSnippet: 香港証券監督委員会がアジア初となるソラナ現物ETFを承認。ChinaAMC運用（香港）で10月27日取引開始。ビットコイン、イーサリアムに続く3番目の仮想通貨ETFとして、米国市場に先駆けた上場となる。

title: 仮想通貨取引、米国で前年比50%増　トランプ効果鮮明に＝2025上半期報告
contentSnippet: TRMラボの最新報告書によると、トランプ政権下で米国の仮想通貨取引高が50%増の1兆ドル超に。日本は普及ランキング9位に上昇。ステーブルコインは前年比83%増で過去最高を記録。
